```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
         geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percentage White",
       y = "CES 3.0 Score",
       title = "White Population in CES 3.0")
```
